Positively charged particle is injected from point c with velocity v₀ at 45° angle to MN.

Grid with points M, N, P, Q, a, b, c, and f marked.

Radius of path is r = mv/(qB).

After collision, horizontal component reverses, new velocity v' = -v_x + v_y.
